verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Command <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and tell <WH559> them, <WH7133> 'My offering, my food for my offerings <WH7133> made by fire, <WH801> of a pleasant <WH5207> aroma <WH7381> to me, <WH8104> you shall observe to offer <WH7126> to me in their due season. <WH4150>'

with the tenth <WH6224> part of an ephah <WH374> of fine flour <WH5560> for a meal offering, <WH4503> mixed <WH1101> with the fourth <WH7243> part of a hin <WH1969> of beaten <WH3795> oil. <WH8081>

It is a continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> which was ordained <WH6213> in Mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514> for a pleasant <WH5207> aroma, <WH7381> an offering made by fire <WH801> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

The other <WH8145> lamb <WH3532> you shall offer <WH6213> at evening: <WH6153> as the meal offering <WH4503> of the morning, <WH1242> and as the drink offering <WH5262> of it, <WH6213> you shall offer it, <WH801> an offering made by fire, of a pleasant <WH5207> aroma <WH7381> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

<WH7676>"'On the Sabbath day <WH3117> two <WH8147> male lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old without blemish, <WH8549> and two <WH8147> tenth <WH6241> parts of an ephah of fine flour <WH5560> for a meal offering, <WH4503> mixed <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> and the drink offering of it: <WH5262>
this is the burnt offering <WH5930> of every Sabbath, <WH7676> besides the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> and the drink offering of it. <WH5262>

<WH7218>"'In the beginnings of your months <WH2320> you shall offer <WH7126> a burnt offering <WH5930> to Yahweh: <WH3068> two <WH8147> young <WH1241> bulls, <WH6499> and one <WH259> ram, <WH352> seven <WH7651> male lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old without blemish; <WH8549>

and three <WH7969> tenth parts of an ephah <WH6241> of fine flour <WH5560> for a meal offering, <WH4503> mixed <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> for each <WH259> bull; <WH6499> and two <WH8147> tenth <WH6241> parts of fine flour <WH5560> for a meal offering, <WH4503> mixed <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> for the one <WH259> ram; <WH352>

and a tenth part <WH6241> of fine flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil <WH8081> for a meal offering <WH4503> to every <WH259> lamb; <WH3532> for a burnt offering <WH5930> of a pleasant <WH5207> aroma, <WH7381> an offering made by fire <WH801> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

Their drink offerings <WH5262> shall be half <WH2677> a hin <WH1969> of wine <WH3196> for a bull, <WH6499> and the third <WH7992> part of a hin <WH1969> for the ram, <WH352> and the fourth <WH7243> part of a hin <WH1969> for a lamb: <WH3532> this is the burnt offering <WH5930> of every month <WH2320> throughout the months <WH2320> of the year. <WH8141>

One <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH5795> for a sin offering <WH2403> to Yahweh; <WH3068> it shall be offered <WH6213> besides the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> and the drink offering of it. <WH5930>
<WH7223>"'In the first month, <WH2320> on the fourteenth <WH702> day <WH3117> of the month, <WH3068> is Yahweh's Passover. <WH6453>
On the fifteenth <WH2568> day <WH3117> of this month <WH2320> shall be a feast: <WH2282> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shall unleavened bread <WH4682> be eaten. <WH398>
In the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> shall be a holy <WH6944> convocation: <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no servile <WH5656> work; <WH4399>

but you shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire, <WH801> a burnt offering <WH5930> to Yahweh: <WH3068> two <WH8147> young <WH1241> bulls, <WH6499> and one <WH259> ram, <WH352> and seven <WH7651> male lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old; <WH8549> they shall be to you without blemish;

and their meal offering, <WH4503> fine flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil: <WH8081> you shall offer <WH6213> three <WH7969> tenth parts <WH6241> for a bull, <WH6499> and two <WH8147> tenth parts <WH6241> for the ram. <WH352>
You shall offer <WH6213> a tenth part <WH6241> for every <WH259> lamb <WH3532> of the seven <WH7651> lambs; <WH3532>
and one <WH259> male goat <WH8163> for a sin offering, <WH2403> to make atonement for you. <WH3722>
You shall offer <WH6213> these besides the burnt offering <WH5930> of the morning, <WH1242> which is for a continual <WH8548> burnt offering. <WH5930>

In this way you shall offer <WH6213> daily, <WH3117> for seven <WH7651> days, <WH3117> the food <WH3899> of the offering made by fire, <WH801> of a pleasant <WH5207> aroma <WH7381> to Yahweh: <WH3068> it shall be offered <WH6213> besides the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> and the drink offering of it. <WH5930>
On the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> you shall have a holy <WH6944> convocation: <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no servile <WH5656> work. <WH4399>

<WH3117>"'Also in the day of the first fruits, <WH1061> when you offer <WH7126> a new <WH2319> meal offering <WH4503> to Yahweh <WH3068> in your feast of weeks, <WH7620> you shall have a holy <WH6944> convocation; <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no servile <WH5656> work; <WH4399>

but you shall offer <WH7126> a burnt offering <WH5930> for a pleasant <WH5207> aroma <WH7381> to Yahweh: <WH3068> two <WH8147> young <WH1241> bulls, <WH6499> one <WH259> ram, <WH352> seven <WH7651> male lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year old; <WH8141>

and their meal offering, <WH4503> fine flour <WH5560> mixed <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> three <WH7969> tenth parts <WH6241> for each <WH259> bull, <WH6499> two <WH8147> tenth parts <WH6241> for the one <WH259> ram, <WH352>
a tenth part <WH6241> for every <WH259> lamb <WH3532> of the seven <WH7651> lambs; <WH3532>
one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat, <WH8163> to make atonement for you. <WH3722>

Besides the continual <WH8548> burnt offering, <WH5930> and the meal offering <WH5930> of it, <WH6213> you shall offer them <WH8549> (they shall be to you without blemish), and their drink offerings. <WH5262>
